sections.text: SIPA’s MPA prepares students to manage and analyze public policy and administration across government, nonprofit, and international organizations.

items: Core in economics, statistics, management, and financial analysis
sections.text: The curriculum blends analytical core courses with concentrations and culminates in a team‑based policy workshop.

items: Completion of required core and concentration credits
sections.text: Students complete core and concentration requirements and a capstone workshop project for an external client.
Graduates advance to leadership roles in public service, NGOs, multilaterals, and the private sector.
